articles.title: Spur 2.0: Out with the Native American imagery, in with 'fresh' | Fin24 - News24
articles.description: For decades, Spur's logo featured the image of a Native American man, but Spur Corporation CEO Val Nichas says the "fresh" Spur will be using product images as its focal point.
